Question: In the Wild Card game against Denver, this person passed for 458 yards and 4 touchdowns.
Hints: In the Wild Card playoff round this person and the Colts defeated the Denver Broncos 41–10, his first playoff win.
This person led the league with 4,267 passing yards and threw 29 touchdowns; he was named first-team All-Pro and to the Pro Bowl.
This person won AFC Offensive Player of the Week for the 2nd time this season (18th time, career).
